entries.text: （开场） Foul tarnished, in search of the Elden Ring. Emboldened by the flame ofambition. Someone must extinguish thy flame. Let it be Margit the Fell!
（战斗中,60%血） Well, thou art of passing skill. Warrior blood must truly run in thyveins,Tarnished.
（击败玩家） Put these foolish ambitions to rest.
（战后） I shall remember thee,Tarnished. Smould'ring with thy meagre flame. Cower in Fear. Of the Night. The hands of the Fell Omen shall brook thee no quarter
